title: What are the total marks for Tallentex this year (2020)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Question Distribution(Total No.of Questions) Physics: 20Chemistry: 20 Biology: 20 (MCQ & Integer : 10 each) Maths: 50 IQ: 50 (MCQ & Integer : 25 each) Total Questions:160 4 marks will be given for a correct answer so the TOTAL MARK is:640.
